statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations
SELECT id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM vehicle_locations
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE id = 1
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, timestamp FROM vehicle_locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM vehicle_locations WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE timestamp >= '2021-10-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT id, timestamp FROM vehicle_locations WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-09-01' AND '2021-09-30' AND latitude <= 45
SELECT DISTINCT latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations WHERE longitude IS NOT NULL ORDER BY latitude DESC
SELECT * FROM gps_trackers WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM gps_trackers WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -70 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT tracker_id, latitude, longitude FROM gps_trackers WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY latitude ASC, longitude DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year >= 2010 ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*), make FROM vehicles GROUP BY make HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM gps_trackers WHERE latitude > 30.0 AND longitude < -90.0
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp FROM gps_trackers WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT vehicles.make, vehicles.model, gps_trackers.latitude, gps_trackers.longitude FROM vehicles JOIN gps_trackers ON vehicles.vehicle_id = gps_trackers.vehicle_id
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(tracker_id) AS total_trackers FROM gps_trackers GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING COUNT(tracker_id) > 1
SELECT vehicles.make, vehicles.model, vehicles.year FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota' OR make = 'Honda' ORDER BY year ASC, make DESC
SELECT * FROM gps_tracker_locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM gps_tracker_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_name = 'Car';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id >= 10;
SELECT * FROM gps_tracker_locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM gps_tracker_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 12345;
SELECT u.username, v.vehicle_name FROM users u JOIN vehicles v ON u.user_id = v.vehicle_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT COUNT(vehicle_id) AS num_vehicles FROM vehicles;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM vehicles;
SELECT * FROM trackers WHERE last_known_latitude > 30 AND last_known_longitude < -80;
SELECT locations.latitude, locations.longitude, trackers.last_known_latitude FROM locations INNER JOIN trackers ON locations.tracker_id = trackers.tracker_id;
SELECT route_id, end_latitude, start_longitude FROM routes ORDER BY end_latitude DESC, start_longitude ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM trackers WHERE last_known_latitude > 50 AND last_known_longitude < -120;
SELECT route_id, start_latitude, start_longitude, end_latitude, end_longitude FROM routes WHERE start_latitude < 40 AND end_longitude > -100;
SELECT location_id, timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT vehicles.vehicle_id, trackers.tracker_id, locations.location_id, locations.latitude, locations.longitude FROM vehicles JOIN trackers ON vehicles.vehicle_id = trackers.vehicle_id JOIN locations ON trackers.tracker_id = locations.tracker_id WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND longitude BETWEEN -110 AND -100;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM trackers WHERE vehicle_id = 123;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT driver_name FROM drivers WHERE contact_number = '+1234567890';
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) AS total_routes FROM routes GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING total_routes > 5;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT driver_name, contact_number FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 5;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_timestamp, end_timestamp FROM routes WHERE driver_id = 3 ORDER BY start_timestamp ASC;
